name: MapleStory Game Data File
summary: Learn about .WZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Examples of MapleStory WZ files include Base.wz, Character.wz, Map.wz, and Sound.wz.
NOTE: The WZ extension stands for "Wizet," which is the name of the Korean company that developed MapleStory.

description: Game archive used by MapleStore, a two-dimensional MMORPG (massively multiplayer online role-playing game); can store several types of game data, including audio, maps, and character information; used for both the original MapleStory installation files and for game patch updates.
